name: Nia (Xenoblade Chronicles) (4 in 1)
description:
Nia from xenoblade chronicles 2 and 3.

This LoRA have for different Nia versions with one activation word for each

classic_nia (original driver Nia costume from xc2)
blade_nia (blade Nia costume from xc2)
hero_nia (hero Nia costume from xc3)
queen_nia (queen of agnus Nia costume from xc3)

its not always needed but you may want to describe a little of the costume you want as well
for exemple:

using classic_nia you may want to add yellow body suit
using blade_nia you may want to add leotard,

using hero_nia you may want to add mini dress and black legwear

using queen_nia you may want to add japanese clothes or kimono

all images were generated using anything v4.5 with xformers on and using kl-f8-anime2 vae

meta.prompt: masterpiece, best quality, absurdres, 1girl, standing, classic_nia, yellow, bodysuit <lora:nia_xenoblade:1>
